title: Replying Salam Non Muslim
description: Authentic supplications for Replying Salam Non Muslim
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Replying Salam Non Muslim. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 227
items.arabic: ((إذَا سَلَّمَ عَلَيْكُمْ أَهْلُ الْكِتَابِ فَقُولُوا: وَعَلَيْكُمْ)).
items.translation: When the people of the Book greet you, reply by saying: (And upon you.)
